titleInfo.title: Accurately Located Masonry Wall Remains: Paris, 950-1797

originInfo.publisher: Analyse Diachronique de l'espace Urbain Parisien: Approche Geomatique

mods.abstract: This point shapefile contains locations of masonry wall remains in Paris based on archaeological references. These remains have been precisely located using a plan contained in the archaeological literature. Each point has been georeferenced to cadastral data provided by the Paris Urban Planning Agency (APUR). The work of gathering the archaeological information was directed by Etienne Lardkhan. (Univ. Paris-1, ed. D. Aina-Deroin and H. Noizet, 2007-2008).
This layer can be used to locate potential sites of wall remains in Paris.
mods.note: ISO 19139 XML Metadata (in French) and a full copy of the license (ODBL) are included with this layer.
